程序包 interact.controller

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    GameLoseController
    This controller controls two actions: Exit game or restart game.
    GameStartController
    This Controller controllers four actions: Change to Level choose page Change to Information page Change to Index page Change to Score board page
    GameWinController
    This controller controls the action: After the winner submit his game, the game change to index page.
    LevelController
    The Class LevelController controls action:
    Change to different game levels .
    ScoreBoardController
    The Class will dispkay the information of TOP5 players.
